/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush greenery, with trees lining both sides, their leaves forming a verdant canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. In the distance, buildings and power lines can be seen, adding an urban touch to the otherwise natural landscape. The image is captured from a low angle, which enhances the sense of depth and perspective. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
